sentences.en: " What are you doling?'she once demanded over the intercom.
sentences.cn: 有一次他母亲通过对讲机问他: “ 你在干什么?

sentences.en: A suit of double - charge - place control system for intercom AS - 543 is proposed.
sentences.cn: 针对对讲机AS543,提出一套双 充电座 控制系统.

sentences.en: Double password lock, closed - circuit television surveillance systems, video intercom system.
sentences.cn: 双重密码门锁, 闭路电视 监视系统, 可视对讲系统.

sentences.en: Drag to indicate the location of a camera with an intercom.
sentences.cn: 拖动可指示带对讲机的摄像机的位置.

sentences.en: He froze when he heard his name called on the intercom.
sentences.cn: 当他听到对讲机里呼叫他的名字时,他一下子愣住了.

sentences.en: I was mortified when my mother paged me on the store intercom.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈在商店的扩音器叫我的时候,我真是难为情死了.

sentences.en: Intercom. Mount type and technology type can be specified.
sentences.cn: 对讲机.可指定安装类型和技术类型.

sentences.en: M ; Hey , It's him. ( on the intercom buzzes ) Who is it?
sentences.cn: 嘿, 是他来了 ( 指着对讲机 ) 是谁 呀 ?

sentences.en: Security technology off the production line: Intercom system and alarm system.
sentences.cn: 安全技术下线: 对讲系统,报警系统.

sentences.en: The communication between crew members was through the use of intercom system.
sentences.cn: 全体乘员之间是通过内部通讯联络系统联系的.

sentences.en: The intercom buzzed and he pressed down the appropriate switch.
sentences.cn: 对讲机发出嗡嗡声，他按下了相应的开关。

sentences.en: The manager spoke to the employees over the intercom.
sentences.cn: 经理用内部的通话系统向员工讲话.

sentences.en: The pilot’s voice came over the intercom.
sentences.cn: 内部通话系统里传来了飞行员的声音。

sentences.en: There is an intercom at the side door of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 酒店侧门设有一部对讲机.

sentences.en: to announce sth over the intercom
sentences.cn: 通过内部通话系统宣布

sentences.en: Used in locomotive communication, pocked intercom telephones, car audio circuits, etc.
sentences.cn: 适用于移动通讯 、 袖珍对讲机, 汽车音响等电路.

phrases.tran_cn: 对讲机系统；内部通信系统

trans.tran_en: a communication system by which people in different parts of a building, aircraft etc can speak to each other
